designations.designation_description: A taxon is Vulnerable when it is not Critically Endangered or Endangered but is facing a high risk of extinction in the wild in the medium term future.
designations.comments: Only in coastal/near-coastal habitats in a small part of SE England, mainly around the Thames estuary. Vulnerable to habitat loss or degradation e.g. through sea-level rise or development, and has shown a decline with losses from several locations
